FuncDef:
The ip netstream log enable command enables the storage function for aged NetStream original flows.
The undo ip netstream log enable command disables the storage function for aged NetStream original flows.
By default, Ip netstream log is disabled.
ExtraInfo: Before querying historical information about original flows from the CF card, you must run the ip netstream log enable command to enable the storage function for aged NetStream original flows.
